alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Prentiss; Tishomingo; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 12:39AM CDT until April 01 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Union County in northeastern Mississippi... Northern Itawamba County in northeastern Mississippi... Northern Lee County in northeastern Mississippi... Southwestern Tishomingo County in northeastern Mississippi... Southern Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1239 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Harmony, or near New Albany, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Albany, Baldwyn, Tishomingo State Park, Saltillo, Guntown, Belmont, Tishomingo, Keownville, New Harmony, Pratts Friendship, Burton, Wheeler, Sandy Springs, Blair, Sherman, Marietta, Blue Springs, Golden, Graham and Thrasher. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
